View Javadoc
1   package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
2   
3   import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
4   import org.apache.http.Header;
5   import org.apache.http.HttpVersion;
6   import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheEntry;
7   import org.apache.http.message.BasicStatusLine;
8   import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
9   import org.junit.Test;
10  import wiremock.org.eclipse.jetty.http.HttpStatus;
11  
12  import java.net.URI;
13  import java.nio.file.Files;
14  import java.nio.file.Path;
15  import java.nio.file.Paths;
16  import java.util.Date;
17  
18  import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.nullValue;
19  import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
20  import static org.hamcrest.core.Is.is;
21  
22  /**
23   * Unit tests for {@linkplain FileBackedIndex}
24   */
25  public class FileBackedIndexTest {
26  
27      @Test
28      public void testAsUri() {
29          assertThat(FileBackedIndex.asUri("foo://test/file.bin"), is(URI.create("foo://test/file.bin")));
30      }
31  
32      @Test
33      public void testUriWithPortAsUri() {
34          assertThat(FileBackedIndex.asUri("bar://test:8080/file.bin"), is(URI.create("bar://test/file.bin")));
35      }
36  
37      @Test
38      public void testUriWithAuthInfoAsUri() {
39          assertThat(FileBackedIndex.asUri("test://bill@test:8080/file.bin"), is(URI.create("test://bill@test/file.bin")));
40      }
41  
42      @Test
43      public void testUriWithAdditionalHeaderInfoUri() {
44          assertThat(FileBackedIndex.asUri("{Accept-Encoding=gzip%2Cdeflate}https://postman-echo.com:443/get"), is(URI.create("https://postman-echo.com/get")));
45      }
46  
47      /**
48       * Cache should check if the file mapped by the index has been deleted by the user and
49       * remove the file from the index reverting to retrieving the remote resource.
50       */
51      @Test
52      public void testIndexedFileNotFound() throws Exception {
53          class ClosablePath implements AutoCloseable {
54              private final Path dir;
55              public ClosablePath(Path dir) {
56                  this.dir = dir;
57              }
58  
59              @Override
60              public void close() throws Exception {
61                  FileUtils.deleteDirectory(dir.toFile());
62              }
63          }
64  
65          Path path = Files.createTempDirectory("file-backed-index");
66          try (AutoCloseable ignored = new ClosablePath(path)){
67              FileBackedIndex index = new FileBackedIndex(path, new SystemStreamLog());
68              index.putEntry("foo://file.bin",
69                      new HttpCacheEntry(new Date(), new Date(),
70                              new BasicStatusLine(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1,
71                                      HttpStatus.OK_200, "OK"), new Header[]{},
72                              new FileIndexResource(Paths.get("bogus"), path)));
73              assertThat(index.getEntry("foo://file.bin"), is(nullValue()));
74          }
75      }
76  }
